Based on style, the work shown can be identified as a folio from which of the following illuminated manuscripts?
choicesHtml: The Vienna Genesis from early Byzantine Europe
The Lindisfarne Gospels from early medieval (Hiberno Saxon) Europe
The Golden Haggadah from late medieval Spain
The Codex Mendoza from the Viceroyalty of New Spain
